mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SH_MEMBER(ID, PWD, NAME, GENDER, RDATE, EMAIL, PNUM, AUTH, DEL) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{rdate}, #{email}, #{pnum}, 3, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, GENDER, RDATE, EMAIL, PNUM, AUTH, DEL FROM SH_MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PWD=#{pwd} AND DEL=0
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM SH_MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND DEL=0
mapper.update: UPDATE SH_MEMBER SET EMAIL=#{email},PNUM=#{pnum} WHERE ID=#{id} AND DEL=0
UPDATE SH_MEMBER SET PWD=#{pwd} WHERE ID=#{id} AND DEL=0
UPDATE SH_MEMBER SET DEL=1 WHERE ID=#{id} AND AUTH=3 AND DEL=0
